p: Thirty‐seven dogs with MVD (21) and DCM (16) (11 dogs in International Cardiac Health Council Class [ISACHC] I, 7 dogs in ISACHC II and 19 dogs in ISACHC III) were included in the study (2 dogs were censored). Survival time was counted from the day of admission when the blood samples were collected to the day of death or euthanasia. Markers were analysed using Cox proportional‐hazards models. Hazard ratios (HR), 95% confidence intervals (CI) and corresponding P values were calculated. A value of P < 0.05 was considered significant.
